content: **knitted shawl in drops kid-silk the piece is worked sideways with garter stitch and picot-edge** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ks-196 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** length measured down the middle = approx 25 cm width measured along the top = approx 139 cm **materials** drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 04 old pink needles drops single pointed needles size 4 5 mm **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 39 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
